topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/550e10766368727e773d0200#post_550e10766368727e773d0200
If we're sharing brutal animal deaths stories [spoiler]one time a cat that my brother used to have crawled into the car for warmth cause of how cold it was and he turned it on and it deskined the cat; the cat didn't die, but the cat got deskined hard and had to be put down cause there was no way it could ever recover.[/spoiler]
Now my brother has a cathouse to keep his cats warm so there isn't a repeat.
